name: Alexander

topics.topic_text: Tell me about Gun Runner caravans.
topics.response_text: Not much to tell. A brahmin or two loaded up with weapons, and a whole mess of well-armed guards to make sure it ends up where it's supposed to.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the Gun Runners.
topics.response_text: The Gun Runners have been putting rapid-fire death-dealing in the hands of anyone who needed to defend himself for over a century.
I'm a salesman. I swing through McCarran and the dam once a week or so to take orders. But lately I spend most of my time in this piss heap.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to see what you have for sale.
topics.response_text: Am I selling? Yeah. Am I selling to you? No. Sorry to hurt your feelings, but you're small time. Move along.

topics.topic_text: So where can I buy some weapons?
topics.response_text: There's usually a gun merchant hanging around topside. I'm sure she'll take care of you.
Like you have a clue what that even means.{scoffing}

topics.topic_text: Why don't you deal in energy weapons?
topics.response_text: We used to. But every caravan carrying them was getting ambushed and wiped out. By someone sophisticated enough to know which was which.

topics.topic_text: I made sure those prisoners won't bother Primm anymore.
topics.response_text: Still plenty of other problems keeping the 15 shut down, though. Thanks for playing.

topics.topic_text: I figure a guy like you gets his pick of killing gear. (>40)
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You might be on to something. I like to hang on to any weapons mods I run across...
You like it any better if I tell you to fuck off?
Is there some reason I should be talking to you?{disdaining}

description:
Alexander is a 38 year-old Hispanic Male.

Alexander is a traveling salesman for the Gun Runners, operating from beneath the 188 Trading Post overpass in the Mojave Wasteland. He specializes in firearms, ammunition, and related merchandise. With the recent closure of Interstate 15, Alexander has capitalized on the increased caravan traffic to expand his customer base. He makes regular trips to Camp McCarran and the Hoover Dam once or twice weekly to conduct sales and fulfill orders for weapons and ammunition.

Alexander's Personality: Pragmatic and business-minded, Alexander values efficiency and profit but maintains ethical boundaries. He's observant, calculating, and knows the value of a good deal. While primarily focused on his bottom line, he's not entirely without compassion, as evidenced by his neutral karma alignment. He speaks with a measured tone and prefers straightforward transactions.

Alexander's Backstory: Born in the ruins of Los Angeles, Alexander learned early in life that survival in the wasteland requires both skill and savvy. He spent his youth learning the mechanics of firearms from his father, a former NCR trooper who had settled in the Mojave. When his settlement was raided by fiends, Alexander fled with little more than his knowledge of weapons and a few family heirlooms. He eventually made his way to the Gun Runners' location at Nellis Air Force Base, where his expertise and personable nature earned him a position as a traveling salesman. After proving his reliability, he was assigned to the 188 Trading Post route, where he has established himself as a trustworthy merchant.
